summary:
The Nintendo Switch is a popular video game console that came out in 2017. It's unique because you can use it as a home console by connecting it to your TV, or as a portable device to play games on the go. The controllers, called Joy-Con, can be attached to the console or used separately. You can play games online or with friends nearby.

Nintendo made the Switch to attract more players and compete with other consoles. It has been a huge success, selling over 143 million units, making it one of the best-selling consoles ever.
title: Nintendo Switch
